task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 14°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the top of the building to estimate its full height, so I will tilt my view upwards.

I can now see the top and bottom of the building; by counting the approximately 13 floors and assuming a standard height of 3 meters per floor plus a bit for the base and roof, I estimate the total height to be around 42 meters.
